item.title: Why Most $1 Million Founders Never Reach $10 Million
item.description: Scaling a business requires a new mindset. Here’s what’s holding you back.

item.title: JPMorgan Is Reportedly Researching Private Companies. OpenAI Is First Under the Microscope
item.description: The firm is beginning by focusing on sectors where private companies have a substantial influence.

item.title: After a $112 Million Deal, Crypto Betting Platform Polymarket Might Return to the U.S.
item.description: It’s financing the move through the purchase of an obscure derivatives clearinghouse.

item.title: Amazon Is Quietly Raising the Price of Basic Goods. Are Tariffs to Blame?
item.description: The Trump administration’s trade war didn’t seem to hurt Prime Day, which Amazon says was the biggest one yet.

item.title: Outdoor Voices Just Wiped Its Instagram. Could This Signal the Return of Ty Haney?
item.description: If Haney is back at the helm, she would be the latest in a string of high-profile female founders taking back control of their companies.
